title: U.S. online shopping frequency 2014 to 2017
summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Once or more per month and lowest at Response Never.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 28.0.
min_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
Response Once or more per month has the highest Share of respondents and Never has the lowest Share of respondents.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Once or more per month and lowest at Response Never.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 28.0.
max_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 32.0 is found at Response Once or more per month and the minimum is found at Never where Response is 4.0.
The second highest Share of respondents is appeared to be the Response At least once a week.
The maximum Response Once or more per month has got 8.0 times higher Share of respondents than the minimum Response Never.
The Response Once or more per month has the highest Share of respondents, followed by At least once a week, and 7-12 times per year. Down to the Response Never which is the lowest.
The highest value 32.0 at Once or more per month is almost 1.92 times larger than the average value 16.67.
The Share of respondents is 100.0 if we add up values of all Responses.
